source_objects.description: Master all things Macintosh: MacBooks, iPad, iPhone, iPod, AppleTV, Keynote, Numbers, Pages and more.
source_objects.title: Apple

items.title: iMovie Beginner to Advance: The Ultimate iMovie Course
items.headline: Every single thing you can do in iMovie is covered in this course from an editor with 15 years of experience.
objectives_summary: Everything iMovie has to offer
Organizing Projects
Basic editing

items.title: Mac 101 - A Beginner's Guide to Mac OS Keyboard Shortcuts

visible_instructors.title: Rusty Ellis
visible_instructors.name: Rusty
visible_instructors.job_title: Husband, Father, Grandpa, and Author. Life has taught me...

items.headline: Learn how to use keyboard shortcuts to quickly navigate inside your Mac OS system and applications.
objectives_summary: How to use common Mac OS keyboard shortcuts to speed up repetitive tasks.
How replace multiple mouse clicks with simple key combinations.
How to use common shortcuts in multiple applications.

items.title: How To Use iMovie To Edit Your Videos
items.headline: Learn step-by-step how to turn your unedited videos into exciting iMovie videos with only 5 easy steps!
objectives_summary: How to make fully edited videos today!
How to make videos quickly without long editing time.
Be able to add a new skill to your resume!

items.title: Tutor for iMovie

visible_instructors.title: Dan Wassink
visible_instructors.name: Dan
visible_instructors.job_title: Producer of Easy-to-Follow Video Tutorials for Apple Devices

items.headline: Learn how to create your own movies on the Mac with our 49 easy-to-follow lectures.
objectives_summary: Create and share movies created from your own video and photos in iMovie v 10.1
Understand the terminology and features of iMovie v10.1 to quickly and efficiently produce quality movie projects.
Understand how to organize, edit, adjust, and add effects to movie clips.

items.title: Mac Keynote: Creating Amazing Presentations On Your Mac

visible_instructors.title: Fran Solo
visible_instructors.name: Fran
visible_instructors.job_title: CEO at Meijin Limited and Apple Certified Trainer

items.headline: Learn how to create presentations for your business, office, school project and training material that you are proud of
objectives_summary: How to create stunning presentations from beginning to end
How to animate slides using transitions
How to create eye-catching animations with photos, videos, tables, charts and shapes

items.title: Mac for Windows Brains

visible_instructors.title: Shana Russell
visible_instructors.name: Shana
visible_instructors.job_title: Former Apple Employee (Trainer), Campus Tech Specialist

items.headline: Learn Mac by building on your Windows knowledge
objectives_summary: Operate a Mac with ease
Understand Mac equivalents for Windows functions
Understand Mac terminology

items.title: Using Mac OS X for Windows Users or complete beginners
items.headline: Whether you're new to Mac OS X or you're moving from Windows, you'll finish this course with a satisfied smile!
objectives_summary: Understand the similarities and differences between Mac OS X and Windows
Be able to navigate around the Mac and carry out the tasks you need to complete with ease
Be aware of many extraordinary features that are contained in Mac OS X that are often overlooked

items.title: Learning FileMaker Pro 13 - A Practical Guide
items.headline: An Essential Practical FileMaker Tutorial The Shows How To Unlock The Power Of FileMaker. No Prior Experience Required
objectives_summary: To learn the core fundamentals of using FileMaker
Learn how to create, use and secure FileMaker databases
Learn how to script, automate and use calculations to manipulate your data

items.title: Mac Basics: Mastering your Mac for home and business
items.headline: Learn about your Mac from a Certified Ethical Hacker, Recognized Apple Teacher, and former AppleCare Senior Advisor.
objectives_summary: Smartly connect to mobile, office, and home networks with a Macintosh computer.
Intelligently protect a Macintosh with native and third-party applications.
Fully understand iCloud and AppleIDs, and how their services give you a seamless experience

items.title: Seamlessly Format and Publish Awesome eBooks With Vellum

visible_instructors.title: David Lee Martin
visible_instructors.name: David Lee
visible_instructors.job_title: Indie author, self publisher, entrepreneur, husband and dad!

items.headline: Generate Perfect Digital Ebooks With One Click, And Publish Like The Pros To Kindle and Beyond Using Vellum For Mac
objectives_summary: Write and create a book in Vellum for Mac.
Design and style your ebook like a pro quickly and with ease.
Style your book so beautifully your readers will think you are an artist!

items.title: Master Using Your Mac in Just 15 Minutes a Day
items.headline: A complete video course of short videos for Senior Citizens, non-Technical people and those switching from a PC to a Mac
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of using a Mac
Aid you in switching from a PC to a Mac
Teach you how to use the Applications that come with every Mac

items.title: Effortlessly Switch from PC to Mac- Tips To Start Strong
items.headline: I will save you hours of stress and frustration as you Switch from PC to Mac. Learn Mac terminology and workflows
objectives_summary: Clear up misconceptions about the Mac
Overcome initial stress and confusion using a Mac
Feel comfortable navigating the Mac

items.title: Numbers for Mac - A Journey from Beginning to Advance level
items.headline: Learn how to work with Numbers (spreadsheet application for mac) and start working with Formulas,Charts,Tables,Sheets.
objectives_summary: Numbers interface and important terminologies regarding spreadsheets.
Working with spreadsheets,tables,cells etc.
Data manipulation, presentation and formatting.

objectives_summary: Open, edit and save documents

Metering working with text, styles and Page layout (Graphics mode)

items.title: Mastering Your iPhone
items.headline: Learn dozens of iPhone tips & tricks to help you get the most from your Apple iPhone
objectives_summary: By the end of this class you will have an understanding on the function and operation of your iPhone, and be able to successfully use the default (included) iPhone Apps. Here is some of what you will learn:

With the unique QuickStart section, you can view 12 short videos to help you quickly learn to perform a common iPhone task or operation right now. Then, come back and thoroughly learn all the options in the full, comprehensive lessons.
How to charge your iPhone, Turn if on & off, using standby mode and how to reset it.
